  • Short Bio

  • I am an incoming PhD student in Columbia University working with Prof. Elias Bareinboim. Previously, I finished my Master’s studies in Brown University, working with Prof. Michael Littman. I obtained my B.S from Beihang University, under the supervision of Prof. Jingyuan Wang.

    My research interest lies in the intersection of causal inference and reinforcement learning, especially in how to build reliable, generalizable and sample efficient agent. Feel free to take a look at this slide, which summarizes my take on RL agents.
